provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Burgers
items.description: 100% All Natural Angus Beef. No Hormones And No Antibiotics Ever. We Grind Our Proprietary Shack Blend Fresh Daily. Our Burgers Are Cooked To Medium And Served Plain Unless Otherwise Requested. Let Us Know If You Would Like Lettuce,  Tomato, Pickle Or Onion.

items.name: Shack Burger
items.description: American cheese, lettuce, tomato and shack sauce.

items.name: 'Shroom Burger (Vegetarian)
items.description: Crisp-fried portobello filled with melted muenster and cheddar cheeses, topped with lettuce, tomato and shacksauce.

items.name: Shack Stack
items.description: Cheeseburger and 'shroom burger topped with lettuce, tomato, and shack sauce.

items.name: Flat Top Dogs
items.description: Split And Griddled Crisp

items.name: Hot Dog
items.description: Vienna all-beef dog

items.name: Bird Dog
items.description: Shake shack chicken, apple and sage sausage. best in show!

items.name: Shack-Cago Dog
items.description: Dragged through the garden with shake shack relish, onion, cucumber, pickle, tomato, sport pepper, celery salt and mustard.

items.name: Frisky Dog
items.description: Topped with spicy tomato-simmered onions

items.name: Mutt
items.description: A breed of your own  kraut, shack cheese   sauce, spicy tomato-simmered onions, shake   shack relish

items.name: Fries
items.description: Crinkle Cut Yukon Potatoes. 100% Free Of Artificial  Trans Fats And 25% Less Fat Than Average Fries.

items.name: Cheese Fries
items.description: Topped with our shack- made  cheddar and american cheese sauce.

items.name: Pooch-Ini
items.description: A chilly treat for those with four feet. shackburger dog biscuits, peanut butter sauce and vanilla custard. includes dairy, sugar and nut products. not intended for small dogs.

items.name: Bag O' Bones
items.description: A real doggie bag: handful of shackburger dog biscuits to go.

items.name: Frozen Custard
items.description: What Happens When Soft Serve Shacks Up With Premium Ice Cream!

items.name: Shakes
items.description: Hand-spun vanilla, chocolate, caramel, black & white, strawberry or peanut butter.

items.name: Fair Shake
items.description: Vanilla shake spun with 100% certified organic arabica fairly traded coffee.

items.name: Floats
items.description: Root beer, purple cow or creamsicle

items.name: Cups & Cones
items.description: Vanilla, chocolate or flavor of the day

items.name: Concretes
items.description: Dense Frozen Custard Blended At High Speed With Shack-made Mix-ins.

items.name: Key Lime Pie Oh' My
items.description: Vanilla custard, slice of sugar monkey key lime pie

items.name: Shark Attack
items.description: Chocolate custard, peanut butter sauce, chocolate truffle cookie dough, valrhona chocolate pearls and chocolate sprinkles

items.name: The Shack Beach Diet
items.description: Vanilla custard, marshmallow sauce and crispy crunchies

items.name: Concreation Foundation
items.description: Design your own!

items.name: Mix-Ins
items.description: Fudge sauce,  caramel sauce,    peanut butter sauce,   marshmallow sauce,   strawberry puree,   chocolate truffle cookie dough,    chocolate toffee,   shortbread cookie,    seasonal fruit,  crispy crunchies.
